Optimalkan penggunaan Drive langsung dari komputer Anda. Semua file Drive Anda diperbarui secara otomatis. Tersedia untuk Windows dan MacOS.
Kami telah mengotomatiskan proses permulaan project. Saat ada project baru, semua template yang relevan akan terduplikasi di sebuah folder Google Drive dalam waktu dua menit.
Kami memiliki 100.000 pengguna dan miliaran file di Google Drive. Kami tidak dapat menangani proses pelabelan dalam skala besar tanpa klasifikasi AI. Begitu diaktifkan, klasifikasi ini langsung memberikan manfaat.
Drive berfungsi sebagai titik rujukan untuk mencari solusi dari semua project kami sebelumnya, sehingga tim kami tidak perlu memulai dari awal saat mengerjakan project baru.
Baca FAQ kami untuk mengetahui informasi selengkapnya.
Ya, Anda dapat menggunakan alat dan layanan migrasi kami untuk memindahkan data penting organisasi Anda ke Google Workspace dari solusi penyimpanan Anda saat ini.
Google Workspace edisi Business dan Enterprise memberikan pilihan fleksibel kepada pelanggan untuk memenuhi kebutuhan penyimpanan mereka. Untuk melihat paket mana yang paling sesuai bagi bisnis Anda, kunjungi halaman paket dan harga.
Drive versi bisnis memberikan penyimpanan lebih besar, dukungan lebih baik, dan drive bersama untuk tim Anda. Pelajari lebih lanjut berbagai opsi yang tersedia di halaman paket dan harga.

title: Google Drive: Share Files Online with Secure Cloud Storage | Google Workspace
description: Learn about Google Drive’s file sharing platform that provides a personal, secure cloud storage option to share content with other users.
text:
AI-powered cloud storage for seamless file sharing and enhanced collaboration.
Gain valuable insights by summarizing long documents, synthesizing information, and retrieving quick facts about your content without having to search through multiple files. See what else Gemini can help you do and try Google Workspace with Gemini.
Simple and scalable cloud storage for people and teams of all sizes. Upload, open, share and edit files from any device.
Scale your storage effortlessly from 15GB to 5TB per user, plus the ability to request additional storage. Storage costs vary.
Save and organize Gmail attachments directly to Drive without leaving your inbox.
Quickly scan and store receipts, billing statements and more as searchable PDFs, directly from the Drive app for Android or iOS.
One place to manage, access, edit, and organize your files effortlessly for a streamlined workflow.
Edit and organize Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, Microsoft Office files, and PDFs in real-time. Plus, access over 100 other file types!
Add and edit comments directly in the PDFs by highlighting text.
Drive's search, powered by AI, offers speed, and reliability by quickly surfacing relevant results based on your activities.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Get a quick overview of your file activity across Workspace in one place, empowering you to act efficiently.
Unleash your team's full potential with seamless collaboration and effortless teamwork.
Easily share files with customizable permissions (edit, comment, view). Control access further by preventing unwanted actions and setting expiration dates.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Shared drives give teams a place to store, access, and manage files together.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Request electronic signatures and easily manage vendor agreements, customer contracts, stakeholder sign-off, and more.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Import and create Google Drive files within third party apps like Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP and many more to streamline your work.
Keep your data in the trusted Google Cloud infrastructure that seamlessly integrates with your Workspace apps.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
Get the most out of Drive right from your computer. Automatically keep all your Drive files up to date. Available for Windows and MacOS.
We’ve automated our kick-off process. When we have a new project come in, within two minutes, we have all of the relevant templates duplicated in a Google Drive folder.
We have 100,000 users and billions of files in Google Drive. We couldn’t handle the labeling process at scale without AI classification. It provides value immediately, from the moment you turn it on.
Drive serves as a reference point for solutions from all our past projects so that our teams won’t feel like they need to reinvent the wheel when they start a new project.
Take a look at our FAQs to learn more.
Yes, you can use our migration tools and services to move your organization’s important data to Google Workspace from your current storage solutions.
Google Workspace’s Business and Enterprise editions provide customers with flexible options to meet their storage needs. To see which plan works best for your business, please visit our plans and pricing page.
The business version of Drive gives you more storage, stronger support, and shared drives for your team. Learn more about the various options available on the plans and pricing page.

title: Google Drive: condividi file online con l'archiviazione sul cloud sicura | Google Workspace
description: Scopri la piattaforma di condivisione file di Google Drive, una soluzione di spazio di archiviazione sul cloud sicura e personale per condividere contenuti con altri utenti.
text:
Archiviazione cloud basata sull'AI per una condivisione dei file fluida e una collaborazione migliorata.
Ottieni approfondimenti preziosi riassumendo documenti lunghi, sintetizzando informazioni e recuperando informazioni rapide sui tuoi contenuti senza dover cercare tra più file. Scopri cos'altro puoi fare con l'aiuto di Gemini provando Google Workspace con Gemini.
Archiviazione cloud semplice e scalabile per persone e team di tutte le dimensioni. Carica, apri, condividi e modifica file da qualsiasi dispositivo.
Aumenta senza sforzo il tuo spazio di archiviazione da 15 GB a 5 TB per utente, oltre alla possibilità di richiedere spazio di archiviazione aggiuntivo.
Salva e organizza gli allegati di Gmail direttamente su Drive senza uscire dalla posta in arrivo.
Esegui rapidamente la scansione e l'archiviazione di ricevute, estratti conto e altro ancora come PDF in cui è possibile eseguire ricerche, direttamente dall'app Drive per Android o iOS.
Un unico posto per gestire, accedere, modificare e organizzare i tuoi file senza sforzo per un flusso di lavoro semplificato.
Modifica e organizza Documenti Google, Fogli, Presentazioni, file Microsoft Office e PDF in tempo reale. In più, accedi a oltre 100 altri tipi di file.
Aggiungi e modifica i commenti direttamente nei PDF evidenziando il testo.
La ricerca di Drive, basata sull'AI, offre velocità e affidabilità, restituendo rapidamente risultati pertinenti in base alle tue attività.
Questa funzionalità è disponibile per alcuni piani Google Workspace Business ed Enterprise.
Ottieni una rapida panoramica dell'attività dei tuoi file in Workspace in un unico posto, consentendoti di agire in modo efficiente.
Raggiungi il pieno potenziale del tuo team con una collaborazione fluida e un lavoro di squadra senza problemi.
Condividi facilmente i file con autorizzazioni personalizzabili (modifica, commento, visualizzazione). Controlla ulteriormente l'accesso impedendo azioni indesiderate e impostando date di scadenza.
Questa funzionalità è disponibile per alcuni piani Google Workspace Business ed Enterprise.
I Drive condivisi offrono ai team un luogo in cui archiviare, accedere e gestire i file insieme.
Questa funzionalità è disponibile per alcuni piani Google Workspace Business ed Enterprise.
Richiedi firme elettroniche e gestisci facilmente accordi con i fornitori, contratti con i clienti, approvazione delle parti interessate e altro ancora.
Questa funzionalità è disponibile per alcuni piani Google Workspace Business ed Enterprise.
Importa e crea file di Google Drive all'interno di app di terze parti come Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP e molte altre per semplificare il tuo lavoro.
Conserva i tuoi dati nell'infrastruttura Google Cloud affidabile che si integra perfettamente con le tue app Workspace.
Approccio cloud-first basato su browser che viene costantemente aggiornato senza dover installare nulla.
Questa funzionalità è disponibile per alcuni piani Google Workspace Business ed Enterprise.
Funzionalità di sicurezza robuste come la crittografia lato client, Vault con approccio Zero Trust salvaguardano i tuoi preziosi dati.
Questa funzionalità è disponibile per alcuni piani Google Workspace Business ed Enterprise.
La classificazione AI impara in modo intelligente cosa consideri contenuto sensibile e lo etichetta automaticamente su Google Drive.
Approccio cloud-first basato su browser che viene costantemente aggiornato senza dover installare nulla.
Questa funzionalità è disponibile per alcuni piani Google Workspace Business ed Enterprise.
Funzionalità di sicurezza robuste come la crittografia lato client, Vault con approccio Zero Trust salvaguardano i tuoi preziosi dati.
Questa funzionalità è disponibile per alcuni piani Google Workspace Business ed Enterprise.
La classificazione AI impara in modo intelligente cosa consideri contenuto sensibile e lo etichetta automaticamente su Google Drive.
Sfrutta al meglio Drive direttamente dal tuo computer. Tieni automaticamente aggiornati tutti i tuoi file di Drive. Disponibile per Windows e MacOS.
Abbiamo automatizzato il nostro processo di avvio. Quando riceviamo un nuovo progetto, in due minuti abbiamo tutti i modelli pertinenti duplicati in una cartella di Google Drive.
Abbiamo 100.000 utenti e miliardi di file su Google Drive. Senza la classificazione AI non potremmo gestire il processo di etichettatura su larga scala. Offre un valore immediato, dal momento in cui inizi a usarla.
Drive funge da punto di riferimento per le soluzioni di tutti i nostri progetti passati, in modo che i nostri team non sentano di dover reinventare la ruota quando iniziano un nuovo progetto.
Dai un'occhiata alle domande frequenti per saperne di più.
Sì, puoi utilizzare i nostri strumenti e servizi per la migrazione per spostare i dati importanti della tua organizzazione in Google Workspace dalle soluzioni di archiviazione che usi attualmente.
Le versioni Business ed Enterprise di Google Workspace offrono ai clienti opzioni flessibili per soddisfare le loro esigenze di archiviazione. Per scoprire il piano che si adatta meglio alla tua azienda, visita la pagina dei piani e dei prezzi.
La versione di Drive per le aziende offre più spazio di archiviazione, assistenza migliore e Drive condivisi per il tuo team. Scopri di più sulle varie opzioni disponibili nella pagina dei piani e dei prezzi.

title: Google ドライブ: セキュアなクラウド ストレージを使ってオンラインでファイルを共有 | Google Workspace
description: Google ドライブのファイル共有プラットフォームについてご紹介します。個人向けの安全なクラウド ストレージとして利用し、コンテンツを他のユーザーと共有できます。
text:
AI 搭載のクラウド ストレージで、シームレスにファイルを共有し、コラボレーションをコラボレーションを強化しましょう。
いくつものファイルから情報を探さなくても、複数の長いドキュメントを要約したり、情報を統合したり、ファイルの内容から事実を集めたりして、価値の高い知見を得ることができます。Gemini を使ってほかにどのようなことができるのか、Google Workspace with Gemini を実際にお試しください。
誰でも、チームの規模を問わず使えるシンプルでスケーラブルなクラウド ストレージ。どのデバイスからでもファイルのアップロード、閲覧、共有、編集が可能です。
1 ユーザーあたり 15 GB から 5 TB までストレージを容易に拡張でき、追加ストレージをリクエストできる機能もあります。
Gmail で受信トレイから離れることなく、添付ファイルを直接ドライブに保存できます。
Android または iOS 用のドライブアプリから直接、領収書や請求明細をすばやくスキャンして、検索可能な PDF 形式で保存できます。
1 か所からファイルを容易に整理、アクセス、編集、管理。効率的なフローを実現します。
Google ドキュメント、スプレッドシート、スライド、Microsoft Office のファイルと PDF をリアルタイムで編集、整理。その他 100 種類以上のファイルにアクセスできます。
PDF でテキストをハイライト表示して、直接コメントを追加、編集できます。
AI を活用したドライブの検索は、スピードと信頼性を誇り、ユーザーのアクティビティに基づいた関連性の高い検索結果をすばやく表示します。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
Workspace におけるユーザーのファイル アクティビティ履歴の概要を 1 か所ですばやく確認。効率的な対応をサポートします。
シームレスなコラボレーションと円滑な共同作業により、チームの可能性を最大限に引き出しましょう。
カスタマイズ可能な権限（編集、コメント、閲覧）を使用して、ファイルを簡単に共有。望まないアクションの制限や有効期限の設定など、アクセス権を細かく管理できます。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
チームで共有ドライブを使用して、ファイルの保存、ファイルへのアクセス、ファイルの管理を 1 か所で行うことができます。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
電子署名のリクエスト、ベンダーや顧客との契約書、関係者による署名などの管理を簡単に行えます。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
Slack、Zoom、Salesforce、Atlassian、SAP、その他多くのサードパーティアプリで、Google ドライブのファイルをインポート、作成し、作業の効率化を実現します。
信頼性の高い Google Cloud のインフラストラクチャでデータを保管。Workspace アプリともシームレスに統合されます。
クラウド ファースト、ブラウザベースのアプローチで常に最新の状態が保たれます。何かをインストールする必要もありません。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
クライアントサイド暗号化やゼロトラスト アプローチの Vault などの堅牢なセキュリティ機能が、大切なデータを保護します。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
ユーザーが何を機密なコンテンツと捉えているかを AI 分類が賢く学習し、Google ドライブで自動でラベル付けをします。
クラウド ファースト、ブラウザベースのアプローチで常に最新の状態が保たれます。何かをインストールする必要もありません。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
クライアントサイド暗号化やゼロトラスト アプローチの Vault などの堅牢なセキュリティ機能が、大切なデータを保護します。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
ユーザーが何を機密なコンテンツと捉えているかを AI 分類が賢く学習し、Google ドライブで自動でラベル付けをします。
パソコンからドライブを最大限に活用。ドライブのすべてのファイルが自動的に最新版になります。Windows と MacOS でご利用いただけます。
キックオフ プロセスを自動化しました。新しいプロジェクトが始まると、2 分以内に、関連するすべてのテンプレートが Google ドライブのフォルダに複製されます。
当社は 10 万人のユーザーを擁し、Google ドライブに数十億個のファイルを保存しています。そのため、AI 分類がなければ大規模なラベル付けプロセスに対応できませんでした。AI 分類は、有効にした瞬間からすぐに価値を発揮してくれます。
ドライブは、過去のすべてのプロジェクトのソリューションの参照ポイントとして機能するため、新しいプロジェクトを開始する際にゼロからやり直す必要がないと感じられます。
よくある質問をご覧ください。
はい。Google がご提供している移行ツールとサービスを使って、大切なデータを現在ご利用のストレージ ソリューションから Google Workspace に移行できます。
Google Workspace の Business エディションと Enterprise エディションでは、必要な保存容量に応じてプランを柔軟に選ぶことができます。お客様にとって最適なプランを、プランと料金のページでご検討ください。
ビジネス向けのドライブではより多くの保存容量をご利用いただけるほか、より充実したサポートや組織のチーム向けの共有ドライブが追加されています。プランと料金のページで各種プランの詳細をご確認ください。

title: Google ドライブ: セキュアなクラウド ストレージを使ってオンラインでファイルを共有 | Google Workspace
description: Google ドライブのファイル共有プラットフォームについてご紹介します。個人向けの安全なクラウド ストレージとして利用し、コンテンツを他のユーザーと共有できます。
text:
AI 搭載のクラウド ストレージで、シームレスにファイルを共有し、コラボレーションをコラボレーションを強化しましょう。
いくつものファイルから情報を探さなくても、複数の長いドキュメントを要約したり、情報を統合したり、ファイルの内容から事実を集めたりして、価値の高い知見を得ることができます。Gemini を使ってほかにどのようなことができるのか、Google Workspace with Gemini を実際にお試しください。
誰でも、チームの規模を問わず使えるシンプルでスケーラブルなクラウド ストレージ。どのデバイスからでもファイルのアップロード、閲覧、共有、編集が可能です。
1 ユーザーあたり 15 GB から 5 TB までストレージを容易に拡張でき、追加ストレージをリクエストできる機能もあります。
Gmail で受信トレイから離れることなく、添付ファイルを直接ドライブに保存できます。
Android または iOS 用のドライブアプリから直接、領収書や請求明細をすばやくスキャンして、検索可能な PDF 形式で保存できます。
1 か所からファイルを容易に整理、アクセス、編集、管理。効率的なフローを実現します。
Google ドキュメント、スプレッドシート、スライド、Microsoft Office のファイルと PDF をリアルタイムで編集、整理。その他 100 種類以上のファイルにアクセスできます。
PDF でテキストをハイライト表示して、直接コメントを追加、編集できます。
AI を活用したドライブの検索は、スピードと信頼性を誇り、ユーザーのアクティビティに基づいた関連性の高い検索結果をすばやく表示します。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
Workspace におけるユーザーのファイル アクティビティ履歴の概要を 1 か所ですばやく確認。効率的な対応をサポートします。
シームレスなコラボレーションと円滑な共同作業により、チームの可能性を最大限に引き出しましょう。
カスタマイズ可能な権限（編集、コメント、閲覧）を使用して、ファイルを簡単に共有。望まないアクションの制限や有効期限の設定など、アクセス権を細かく管理できます。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
チームで共有ドライブを使用して、ファイルの保存、ファイルへのアクセス、ファイルの管理を 1 か所で行うことができます。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
電子署名のリクエスト、ベンダーや顧客との契約書、関係者による署名などの管理を簡単に行えます。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
Slack、Zoom、Salesforce、Atlassian、SAP、その他多くのサードパーティアプリで、Google ドライブのファイルをインポート、作成し、作業の効率化を実現します。
信頼性の高い Google Cloud のインフラストラクチャでデータを保管。Workspace アプリともシームレスに統合されます。
クラウド ファースト、ブラウザベースのアプローチで常に最新の状態が保たれます。何かをインストールする必要もありません。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
クライアントサイド暗号化やゼロトラスト アプローチの Vault などの堅牢なセキュリティ機能が、大切なデータを保護します。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。
ユーザーが何を機密なコンテンツと捉えているかを AI 分類が賢く学習し、Google ドライブで自動でラベル付けをします。
クラウド ファースト、ブラウザベースのアプローチで常に最新の状態が保たれます。何かをインストールする必要もありません。
この機能は、Google Workspace の Business プランと Enterprise プランでご利用いただけます。

title: Google Drive: Share Files Online with Secure Cloud Storage | Google Workspace
description: Learn about Google Drive’s file sharing platform that provides a personal, secure cloud storage option to share content with other users.
text:
AI-powered cloud storage for seamless file sharing and enhanced collaboration.
Gain valuable insights by summarizing long documents, synthesizing information, and retrieving quick facts about your content without having to search through multiple files. See what else Gemini can help you do and try Google Workspace with Gemini.
Simple and scalable cloud storage for people and teams of all sizes. Upload, open, share and edit files from any device.
Scale your storage effortlessly from 15GB to 5TB per user, plus the ability to request additional storage. Storage costs vary.
Save and organize Gmail attachments directly to Drive without leaving your inbox.
Quickly scan and store receipts, billing statements and more as searchable PDFs, directly from the Drive app for Android or iOS.
One place to manage, access, edit, and organize your files effortlessly for a streamlined workflow.
Edit and organize Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, Microsoft Office files, and PDFs in real-time. Plus, access over 100 other file types!
Add and edit comments directly in the PDFs by highlighting text.
Drive's search, powered by AI, offers speed, and reliability by quickly surfacing relevant results based on your activities.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Get a quick overview of your file activity across Workspace in one place, empowering you to act efficiently.
Unleash your team's full potential with seamless collaboration and effortless teamwork.
Easily share files with customizable permissions (edit, comment, view). Control access further by preventing unwanted actions and setting expiration dates.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Shared drives give teams a place to store, access, and manage files together.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Request electronic signatures and easily manage vendor agreements, customer contracts, stakeholder sign-off, and more.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Import and create Google Drive files within third party apps like Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP and many more to streamline your work.
Keep your data in the trusted Google Cloud infrastructure that seamlessly integrates with your Workspace apps.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
Get the most out of Drive right from your computer. Automatically keep all your Drive files up to date. Available for Windows and MacOS.
We’ve automated our kick-off process. When we have a new project come in, within two minutes, we have all of the relevant templates duplicated in a Google Drive folder.
We have 100,000 users and billions of files in Google Drive. We couldn’t handle the labeling process at scale without AI classification. It provides value immediately, from the moment you turn it on.
Drive serves as a reference point for solutions from all our past projects so that our teams won’t feel like they need to reinvent the wheel when they start a new project.
Take a look at our FAQs to learn more.
Yes, you can use our migration tools and services to move your organization’s important data to Google Workspace from your current storage solutions.
Google Workspace’s Business and Enterprise editions provide customers with flexible options to meet their storage needs. To see which plan works best for your business, please visit our plans and pricing page.
The business version of Drive gives you more storage, stronger support, and shared drives for your team. Learn more about the various options available on the plans and pricing page.

Gain valuable insights by summarizing long documents, synthesizing information, and retrieving quick facts about your content without having to search through multiple files. See what else Gemini can help you do and try Google Workspace with Gemini.
Simple and scalable cloud storage for people and teams of all sizes. Upload, open, share and edit files from any device.
Scale your storage effortlessly from 15GB to 5TB per user, plus the ability to request additional storage. Storage costs vary.
Save and organize Gmail attachments directly to Drive without leaving your inbox.
Quickly scan and store receipts, billing statements and more as searchable PDFs, directly from the Drive app for Android or iOS.
One place to manage, access, edit, and organize your files effortlessly for a streamlined workflow.
Edit and organize Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, Microsoft Office files, and PDFs in real-time. Plus, access over 100 other file types!
Add and edit comments directly in the PDFs by highlighting text.
Drive's search, powered by AI, offers speed, and reliability by quickly surfacing relevant results based on your activities.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Get a quick overview of your file activity across Workspace in one place, empowering you to act efficiently.
Unleash your team's full potential with seamless collaboration and effortless teamwork.
Easily share files with customizable permissions (edit, comment, view). Control access further by preventing unwanted actions and setting expiration dates.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Shared drives give teams a place to store, access, and manage files together.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Request electronic signatures and easily manage vendor agreements, customer contracts, stakeholder sign-off, and more.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Import and create Google Drive files within third party apps like Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP and many more to streamline your work.
Keep your data in the trusted Google Cloud infrastructure that seamlessly integrates with your Workspace apps.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
Get the most out of Drive right from your computer. Automatically keep all your Drive files up to date. Available for Windows and MacOS.
We’ve automated our kick-off process. When we have a new project come in, within two minutes, we have all of the relevant templates duplicated in a Google Drive folder.
We have 100,000 users and billions of files in Google Drive. We couldn’t handle the labeling process at scale without AI classification. It provides value immediately, from the moment you turn it on.
Drive serves as a reference point for solutions from all our past projects so that our teams won’t feel like they need to reinvent the wheel when they start a new project.
Take a look at our FAQs to learn more.
Yes, you can use our migration tools and services to move your organization’s important data to Google Workspace from your current storage solutions.
Google Workspace’s Business and Enterprise editions provide customers with flexible options to meet their storage needs. To see which plan works best for your business, please visit our plans and pricing page.
The business version of Drive gives you more storage, stronger support, and shared drives for your team. Learn more about the various options available on the plans and pricing page.

title: Google Drive: 안전한 클라우드 스토리지로 온라인에서 파일 공유 | Google Workspace
description: 다른 사용자와 콘텐츠를 공유할 수 있도록 안전한 개인용 클라우드 스토리지 옵션이 제공되는 Google Drive의 파일 공유 플랫폼에 대해 알아보세요.
text:
원활한 파일 공유 및 더 효율적인 공동작업을 위한 AI 기반 클라우드 스토리지입니다.
여러 파일을 뒤적일 필요 없이 긴 문서를 요약하고, 정보를 종합하고, 콘텐츠에 대한 간단한 사실을 검색하여 가치 있는 유용한 정보를 얻으세요. Gemini의 다른 기능에 관해 알아보고 Gemini 기반 Google Workspace를 사용해 보세요.
모든 규모의 팀과 사용자를 위한 간편하고 확장 가능한 클라우드 스토리지로 어느 기기에서나 파일 업로드, 열기, 공유, 수정이 가능합니다.
사용자당 15GB에서 5TB까지 손쉽게 저장용량을 확장하고 추가 저장용량을 요청할 수도 있습니다.
받은편지함에서 바로 Gmail 첨부파일을 Drive에 저장하고 정리하세요.
Android 또는 iOS용 Drive 앱에서 바로 영수증, 청구서 등을 빠르게 스캔하고 검색 가능한 PDF로 저장하세요.
한곳에서 파일을 쉽게 관리, 액세스, 편집, 정리하여 작업 흐름을 간소화할 수 있습니다.
Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, Microsoft Office 파일, PDF를 실시간으로 수정 및 정리하세요. 그리고 100개 이상의 다른 파일 형식도 이용할 수 있습니다.
PDF에서 텍스트를 강조 표시하여 직접 의견을 추가하거나 수정하세요.
Drive의 AI 기반 검색 기능은 빠른 속도와 우수한 안정성을 갖추고 있어 사용자의 활동을 바탕으로 관련성 높은 결과를 신속하게 표시합니다.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 요금제 중 일부에서 사용 가능한 기능입니다.
Workspace 전반의 파일 활동을 한곳에서 빠르게 살펴봄으로써 작업을 효율적으로 진행할 수 있습니다.
원활한 공동작업과 손쉬운 팀워크로 팀의 잠재력을 최대한 발휘하세요.
파일에 대한 권한(편집, 댓글 쓰기, 보기)을 맞춤설정하여 쉽게 공유할 수 있습니다. 원치 않는 작업을 방지하고 만료일을 설정하여 액세스를 더욱 구체적으로 제어하세요.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 요금제 중 일부에서 사용 가능한 기능입니다.
공유 드라이브는 팀원들이 파일을 함께 저장하고 액세스하고 관리할 수 있는 공간입니다.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 요금제 중 일부에서 사용 가능한 기능입니다.
전자 서명을 요청하고 공급업체 계약, 고객 계약, 이해관계자 승인 등을 손쉽게 관리할 수 있습니다.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 요금제 중 일부에서 사용 가능한 기능입니다.
서드 파티 앱(예: Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP 등)에서 Google Drive 파일을 가져오고 만들어 작업을 간소화하세요.
Workspace 앱과 원활하게 통합되며 신뢰할 수 있는 Google Cloud 인프라에 데이터를 보관하세요.
아무것도 설치할 필요 없이 지속적으로 업데이트되는 클라우드 중심, 브라우저 기반 접근 방식입니다.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 요금제 중 일부에서 사용 가능한 기능입니다.
클라이언트 측 암호화, 제로 트러스트 접근 방식을 적용한 Vault와 같은 강력한 보안 기능으로 귀중한 데이터를 보호하세요.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 요금제 중 일부에서 사용 가능한 기능입니다.
AI 분류 기능은 사용자가 민감한 콘텐츠로 간주하는 항목을 지능적으로 학습하고 Google Drive에서 해당 항목에 자동으로 라벨을 지정합니다.
아무것도 설치할 필요 없이 지속적으로 업데이트되는 클라우드 중심, 브라우저 기반 접근 방식입니다.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 요금제 중 일부에서 사용 가능한 기능입니다.
클라이언트 측 암호화, 제로 트러스트 접근 방식을 적용한 Vault와 같은 강력한 보안 기능으로 귀중한 데이터를 보호하세요.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 요금제 중 일부에서 사용 가능한 기능입니다.
AI 분류 기능은 사용자가 민감한 콘텐츠로 간주하는 항목을 지능적으로 학습하고 Google Drive에서 해당 항목에 자동으로 라벨을 지정합니다.
Drive를 컴퓨터에서 바로 최대한 활용하세요. 자동으로 모든 Drive 파일을 최신 상태로 업데이트할 수 있습니다. Windows 및 MacOS에서 사용할 수 있습니다.
시작 프로세스를 자동화했습니다. 새 프로젝트가 시작되면 2분 이내에 모든 관련 템플릿이 Google Drive 폴더에 복제됩니다.
로슈에서는 10만 명이 Google Drive를 사용해 수십억 개의 파일을 보관합니다. AI 분류가 없었다면 라벨 지정 프로세스를 대규모로 처리할 수 없었을 것입니다. 사용하는 즉시 그 이점을 누릴 수 있는 기능이라고 생각합니다.
Drive는 과거 프로젝트 솔루션을 참고할 수 있는 창구로서 팀이 새 프로젝트를 시작할 때 굳이 처음부터 다시 시작할 필요가 없습니다.
FAQ에서 자세히 알아보세요.
네, Google의 이전 도구와 서비스를 사용하여 조직의 중요 데이터를 현재 사용 중인 스토리지 솔루션에서 Google Workspace로 옮길 수 있습니다.
Google Workspace의 Business 및 Enterprise 버전은 고객이 필요로 하는 저장용량에 따라 선택할 수 있는 유연한 옵션을 제공합니다. 요금제 및 가격 페이지에서 귀하의 비즈니스에 가장 적합한 요금제를 알아보세요.
Drive의 비즈니스 버전은 더 많은 저장용량, 더 강력한 지원, 공유 드라이브를 제공합니다. 요금제 및 가격 페이지에서 다양한 옵션에 관해 자세히 알아보세요.

title: Google Drive: Share Files Online with Secure Cloud Storage | Google Workspace
description: Learn about Google Drive’s file sharing platform that provides a personal, secure cloud storage option to share content with other users.
text:
AI-powered cloud storage for seamless file sharing and enhanced collaboration.
Gain valuable insights by summarizing long documents, synthesizing information, and retrieving quick facts about your content without having to search through multiple files. See what else Gemini can help you do and try Google Workspace with Gemini.
Simple and scalable cloud storage for people and teams of all sizes. Upload, open, share and edit files from any device.
Scale your storage effortlessly from 15GB to 5TB per user, plus the ability to request additional storage. Storage costs vary.

title: Google Drive: Bestanden online delen met beveiligde cloudopslag | Google Workspace
description: Ontdek meer over het Google Drive-platform voor het delen van bestanden dat een persoonlijke, beveiligde cloudopslagoptie biedt waarin u content kunt delen met andere gebruikers.
text:
AI-gestuurde cloudopslag om naadloos bestanden te delen en beter te kunnen samenwerken.
Krijg waardevolle inzichten door lange documenten samen te vatten, informatie samen te voegen en snel informatie over uw content op te halen zonder in meerdere bestanden te hoeven zoeken. Ontdek wat Gemini voor u kan doen. Probeer Google Workspace met Gemini nu uit.

title: Google Disk: Del filer på nettet med sikker lagring i nettskyen | Google Workspace
description: Finn ut mer om plattformen for fildeling i Google Disk – den gir mulighet for personlig og sikker lagring i nettskyen, og du kan dele innhold med andre brukere.
text:
AI-basert lagring i nettskyen for sømløs fildeling og bedre samarbeid.
Få verdifull innsikt ved å oppsummere lange dokumenter, syntetisere informasjon og hente raske fakta om innholdet ditt uten å måtte gjennomsøke flere filer. Se andre ting Gemini kan hjelpe deg med, og prøv Google Workspace med Gemini.
Enkel og skalerbar lagring i nettskyen for folk og team uansett lagringsbehov. Last opp, åpne, del og rediger filer fra alle typer enheter.
Du kan enkelt skalere lagringsplassen fra 15 GB til 5 TB per bruker. Det er også mulig å be om mer lagringsplass.
Lagre og organiser Gmail-vedlegg direkte i Disk uten å forlate innboksen.
Du kan raskt skanne og lagre kvitteringer, kontoutskrifter med mer som søkbare PDF-er — direkte fra Disk-appen for Android eller iOS.
Ett sted der du kan administrere, åpne, redigere og organisere filer enkelt og effektivt.
Rediger og organiser Google-dokumenter, -regneark og -presentasjoner, Microsoft Office-filer og PDF-er i sanntid. Og du kan åpne mer enn 100 andre filtyper!
Legg til og endre kommentarer direkte i PDF-er ved å markere tekst.
Med AI-baserte søk i Disk får du raske, relevante og pålitelige resultater basert på aktivitetene dine.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Få oversikt over all filaktiviteten din i Workspace raskt på ett sted, slik at du kan jobbe mer effektivt.
Utnytt medarbeidernes fulle potensial med verktøy for sømløst og effektivt teamarbeid.
Du kan enkelt dele filer med tillatelser som kan tilpasses (redigering, kommentering og/eller lesetilgang). Få enda bedre kontroll over tilgangen ved å hindre uønskede handlinger og angi utløpsdatoer.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Med delte disker har teamene et sted der de kan lagre, åpne og behandle filer sammen.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Be om elektroniske signaturer og administrer enkelt leverandøravtaler, kundekontrakter, signaturer fra interessenter med mer.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Effektiviser arbeidet ved å importere og opprette Google Disk-filer i tredjepartsapper som Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP og mange flere.
Oppbevar data i den pålitelige Google Cloud-infrastrukturen som integreres sømløst med Workspace-appene.
En skybasert løsning som brukes via nettleseren og oppdateres kontinuerlig — uten at noe må installeres.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Robuste sikkerhetsverktøy som kryptering på klientsiden og Arkiv med tillitsløs sikkerhet sørger for at verdifulle data beskyttes.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
AI-klassifisering lærer seg hva du anser som sensitivt innhold, og setter automatisk etikett på det i Google Disk.
En skybasert løsning som brukes via nettleseren og oppdateres kontinuerlig — uten at noe må installeres.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Robuste sikkerhetsverktøy som kryptering på klientsiden og Arkiv med tillitsløs sikkerhet sørger for at verdifulle data beskyttes.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
AI-klassifisering lærer seg hva du anser som sensitivt innhold, og setter automatisk etikett på det i Google Disk.
Få mest mulig ut av Disk — rett fra datamaskinen. Alle Disk-filene dine holdes oppdatert automatisk. Tilgjengelig for Windows og MacOS.
Vi har automatisert oppstartsprosessen. Når vi får et nytt prosjekt, har vi alle de relevante malene duplisert i en Google Disk-mappe innen to minutter.
Vi har 100 000 brukere og milliarder av filer i Google Disk. Vi hadde ikke klart å sette etikett på alt uten AI-klassifisering. Funksjonen fungerer umiddelbart – det er bare å slå den på
Disk fungerer som et referansepunkt for løsninger fra alle tidligere prosjekter, slik at teamene våre ikke føler at de må finne opp hjulet på nytt når de starter et nytt prosjekt.
Gå til de vanlige spørsmålene for å finne ut mer.
Ja, du kan bruke overføringsverktøyene og -tjenestene våre til å flytte organisasjonens viktige data til Google Workspace fra lagringsløsningene du bruker nå.
Med Business- og Enterprise-utgavene av Google Workspace får kunder fleksible alternativer for å dekke lagringsbehovene sine. Finn det beste abonnementet for bedriften din ved å gå til siden med abonnementer og priser.
Med bedriftsversjonen av Disk får du mer lagringsplass, utvidet brukerstøtte og delte disker for teamet ditt. Finn ut mer om de ulike alternativene på siden med abonnementer og priser.

title: Google Disk: Del filer på nettet med sikker lagring i nettskyen | Google Workspace
description: Finn ut mer om plattformen for fildeling i Google Disk – den gir mulighet for personlig og sikker lagring i nettskyen, og du kan dele innhold med andre brukere.
text:
AI-basert lagring i nettskyen for sømløs fildeling og bedre samarbeid.
Få verdifull innsikt ved å oppsummere lange dokumenter, syntetisere informasjon og hente raske fakta om innholdet ditt uten å måtte gjennomsøke flere filer. Se andre ting Gemini kan hjelpe deg med, og prøv Google Workspace med Gemini.
Enkel og skalerbar lagring i nettskyen for folk og team uansett lagringsbehov. Last opp, åpne, del og rediger filer fra alle typer enheter.
Du kan enkelt skalere lagringsplassen fra 15 GB til 5 TB per bruker. Det er også mulig å be om mer lagringsplass.
Lagre og organiser Gmail-vedlegg direkte i Disk uten å forlate innboksen.
Du kan raskt skanne og lagre kvitteringer, kontoutskrifter med mer som søkbare PDF-er — direkte fra Disk-appen for Android eller iOS.
Ett sted der du kan administrere, åpne, redigere og organisere filer enkelt og effektivt.
Rediger og organiser Google-dokumenter, -regneark og -presentasjoner, Microsoft Office-filer og PDF-er i sanntid. Og du kan åpne mer enn 100 andre filtyper!
Legg til og endre kommentarer direkte i PDF-er ved å markere tekst.
Med AI-baserte søk i Disk får du raske, relevante og pålitelige resultater basert på aktivitetene dine.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Få oversikt over all filaktiviteten din i Workspace raskt på ett sted, slik at du kan jobbe mer effektivt.
Utnytt medarbeidernes fulle potensial med verktøy for sømløst og effektivt teamarbeid.
Du kan enkelt dele filer med tillatelser som kan tilpasses (redigering, kommentering og/eller lesetilgang). Få enda bedre kontroll over tilgangen ved å hindre uønskede handlinger og angi utløpsdatoer.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Med delte disker har teamene et sted der de kan lagre, åpne og behandle filer sammen.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Be om elektroniske signaturer og administrer enkelt leverandøravtaler, kundekontrakter, signaturer fra interessenter med mer.
Denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig for noen Google Workspace Business- og Enterprise-abonnementer.
Effektiviser arbeidet ved å importere og opprette Google Disk-filer i tredjepartsapper som Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP og mange flere.
Oppbevar data i den pålitelige Google Cloud-infrastrukturen som integreres sømløst med Workspace-appene.

title: Google Drive: Share Files Online with Secure Cloud Storage | Google Workspace
description: Learn about Google Drive’s file sharing platform that provides a personal, secure cloud storage option to share content with other users.
text:
AI-powered cloud storage for seamless file sharing and enhanced collaboration.
Gain valuable insights by summarizing long documents, synthesizing information, and retrieving quick facts about your content without having to search through multiple files. See what else Gemini can help you do and try Google Workspace with Gemini.
Simple and scalable cloud storage for people and teams of all sizes. Upload, open, share and edit files from any device.
Scale your storage effortlessly from 15GB to 5TB per user, plus the ability to request additional storage. Storage costs vary.
Save and organize Gmail attachments directly to Drive without leaving your inbox.
Quickly scan and store receipts, billing statements and more as searchable PDFs, directly from the Drive app for Android or iOS.
One place to manage, access, edit, and organize your files effortlessly for a streamlined workflow.
Edit and organize Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, Microsoft Office files, and PDFs in real-time. Plus, access over 100 other file types!
Add and edit comments directly in the PDFs by highlighting text.
Drive's search, powered by AI, offers speed, and reliability by quickly surfacing relevant results based on your activities.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Get a quick overview of your file activity across Workspace in one place, empowering you to act efficiently.
Unleash your team's full potential with seamless collaboration and effortless teamwork.
Easily share files with customizable permissions (edit, comment, view). Control access further by preventing unwanted actions and setting expiration dates.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Shared drives give teams a place to store, access, and manage files together.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Request electronic signatures and easily manage vendor agreements, customer contracts, stakeholder sign-off, and more.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Import and create Google Drive files within third party apps like Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP and many more to streamline your work.
Keep your data in the trusted Google Cloud infrastructure that seamlessly integrates with your Workspace apps.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
Get the most out of Drive right from your computer. Automatically keep all your Drive files up to date. Available for Windows and MacOS.
We’ve automated our kick-off process. When we have a new project come in, within two minutes, we have all of the relevant templates duplicated in a Google Drive folder.
We have 100,000 users and billions of files in Google Drive. We couldn’t handle the labeling process at scale without AI classification. It provides value immediately, from the moment you turn it on.
Drive serves as a reference point for solutions from all our past projects so that our teams won’t feel like they need to reinvent the wheel when they start a new project.
Take a look at our FAQs to learn more.
Yes, you can use our migration tools and services to move your organization’s important data to Google Workspace from your current storage solutions.
Google Workspace’s Business and Enterprise editions provide customers with flexible options to meet their storage needs. To see which plan works best for your business, please visit our plans and pricing page.
The business version of Drive gives you more storage, stronger support, and shared drives for your team. Learn more about the various options available on the plans and pricing page.

title: Dysk Google: udostępnianie plików online za pomocą bezpiecznego miejsca w chmurze | Google Workspace
description: Poznaj platformę do udostępniania plików Dysku Google, która pozwala na bezpieczne przechowywanie treści w osobistych magazynach w chmurze i udostępnianie ich innym użytkownikom.
text:
Miejsce w chmurze oparte na AI, które umożliwia sprawne udostępnianie plików oraz lepszą współpracę.
Uzyskuj cenne informacje dzięki funkcjom streszczania długich dokumentów, syntezy danych oraz uzyskiwania treściwych wniosków dotyczących Twoich materiałów bez konieczności przeszukiwania wielu plików. Wypróbuj Google Workspace z Gemini i zobacz, w czym jeszcze Gemini może Ci pomóc.
Łatwe w użyciu i skalowalne miejsce w chmurze dla pojedynczych użytkowników oraz zespołów każdej wielkości. Przesyłaj, otwieraj, udostępniaj i edytuj pliki na dowolnym urządzeniu.
Możesz łatwo zwiększyć miejsce na dane z 15 GB do 5 TB na użytkownika, a także poprosić o dodatkowe miejsce.
Możesz zapisywać i porządkować załączniki Gmaila bezpośrednio na Dysku bez wychodzenia ze skrzynki odbiorczej.
Przy użyciu aplikacji Dysku na Androida i iOS możesz szybko skanować rachunki, zestawienia operacji i inne dokumenty oraz zapisywać je w postaci plików PDF, które można przeszukiwać.
Jedno miejsce, w którym możesz łatwo otwierać, edytować i porządkować pliki oraz nimi zarządzać, co usprawnia pracę.
Możliwość edytowania i porządkowania plików Dokumentów, Arkuszy i Prezentacji Google oraz plików Microsoft Office i PDF w czasie rzeczywistym. Zapewniamy też dostęp do ponad 100 innych typów plików.
Możesz dodawać i edytować komentarze bezpośrednio w plikach PDF po zaznaczeniu w nich tekstu.
Wyszukiwanie na Dysku przy użyciu AI szybko i niezawodnie wyświetla trafne wyniki na podstawie Twojej aktywności.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Możesz w jednym miejscu zobaczyć krótkie podsumowanie Twoich działań na plikach w Workspace, co pozwoli Ci zwiększyć Twoją wydajność.
Uwolnij pełny potencjał swojego zespołu dzięki sprawnej współpracy.
Możesz łatwo udostępniać pliki przy użyciu uprawnień z możliwością dostosowania (do edytowania, komentowania i wyświetlania). Jeśli potrzebujesz jeszcze większej kontroli nad dostępem, możesz też uniemożliwić niepożądane działania i ustawić daty wygaśnięcia dostępu.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Dyski współdzielone to miejsca, w których zespoły mogą wspólnie przechowywać i otwierać pliki oraz nimi zarządzać.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Wysyłaj prośby o podpisy elektroniczne i łatwo zarządzaj umowami z dostawcami i klientami, zatwierdzeniami oraz innymi dokumentami.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Możesz importować i tworzyć pliki z Dysku Google w aplikacjach innych firm, takich jak Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP i wielu innych, aby usprawnić swoją pracę.
Przechowuj dane w zaufanej infrastrukturze Google Cloud, która płynnie integruje się z aplikacjami Workspace.
Rozwiązanie działające w chmurze i obsługiwane za pomocą przeglądarki, które jest stale aktualizowane – nie musisz niczego instalować.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Niezawodne funkcje bezpieczeństwa takie jak szyfrowanie po stronie klienta i Vault wraz z modelem „zero zaufania” chronią Twoje cenne dane.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Klasyfikacja AI wyciąga inteligentne wnioski o tym, które treści są dla Ciebie poufne i automatycznie oznacza je etykietą na Dysku Google.
Rozwiązanie działające w chmurze i obsługiwane za pomocą przeglądarki, które jest stale aktualizowane – nie musisz niczego instalować.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Niezawodne funkcje bezpieczeństwa takie jak szyfrowanie po stronie klienta i Vault wraz z modelem „zero zaufania” chronią Twoje cenne dane.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Klasyfikacja AI wyciąga inteligentne wnioski o tym, które treści są dla Ciebie poufne i automatycznie oznacza je etykietą na Dysku Google.
W pełni wykorzystuj możliwości Dysku bezpośrednio z komputera. Automatycznie aktualizuj wszystkie pliki na Dysku. Aplikacja dostępna na komputerach z systemem Windows i macOS.
Zautomatyzowaliśmy proces rozpoczęcia współpracy. Gdy otrzymujemy nowy projekt, w ciągu 2 minut mamy wszystkie odpowiednie szablony skopiowane w folderze na Dysku Google.
Na Dysku Google mamy miliardy plików, z których korzysta 100 tys. użytkowników. Bez klasyfikacji AI nie bylibyśmy w stanie oznaczać plików etykietami na dużą skalę. Już samo jej włączenie zapewnia dodatkową wartość.
Na Dysku gromadzimy rozwiązania ze wszystkich poprzednich projektów, dzięki czemu nasze zespoły nie muszą wymyślać koła na nowo, gdy rozpoczynają nowy projekt.
Przeczytaj odpowiedzi na najczęstsze pytania.
Tak, możesz przenieść ważne dane Twojej organizacji z obecnie używanych rozwiązań do przechowywania danych do Google Workspace przy użyciu naszych narzędzi i usług do migracji.
Wersje Business i Enterprise Google Workspace zapewniają klientom elastyczne opcje pozwalające uzyskać potrzebne miejsce na dane. Aby zobaczyć, który abonament sprawdzi się najlepiej w Twojej firmie, zajrzyj na stronę z informacjami o abonamentach i cenach.
W biznesowej wersji Dysku masz więcej miejsca na dane, bardziej rozbudowaną pomoc i dyski współdzielone dla zespołu. Aby dowiedzieć się więcej o różnych dostępnych opcjach, odwiedź stronę z informacjami o abonamentach i cenach.

Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.

Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Wysyłaj prośby o podpisy elektroniczne i łatwo zarządzaj umowami z dostawcami i klientami, zatwierdzeniami oraz innymi dokumentami.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Możesz importować i tworzyć pliki z Dysku Google w aplikacjach innych firm, takich jak Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP i wielu innych, aby usprawnić swoją pracę.
Przechowuj dane w zaufanej infrastrukturze Google Cloud, która płynnie integruje się z aplikacjami Workspace.
Rozwiązanie działające w chmurze i obsługiwane za pomocą przeglądarki, które jest stale aktualizowane – nie musisz niczego instalować.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Niezawodne funkcje bezpieczeństwa takie jak szyfrowanie po stronie klienta i Vault wraz z modelem „zero zaufania” chronią Twoje cenne dane.
Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Klasyfikacja AI wyciąga inteligentne wnioski o tym, które treści są dla Ciebie poufne i automatycznie oznacza je etykietą na Dysku Google.
Rozwiązanie działające w chmurze i obsługiwane za pomocą przeglądarki, które jest stale aktualizowane – nie musisz niczego instalować.

Ta funkcja jest dostępna w ramach niektórych subskrypcji Google Workspace Business i Enterprise.
Klasyfikacja AI wyciąga inteligentne wnioski o tym, które treści są dla Ciebie poufne i automatycznie oznacza je etykietą na Dysku Google.
W pełni wykorzystuj możliwości Dysku bezpośrednio z komputera. Automatycznie aktualizuj wszystkie pliki na Dysku. Aplikacja dostępna na komputerach z systemem Windows i macOS.
Zautomatyzowaliśmy proces rozpoczęcia współpracy. Gdy otrzymujemy nowy projekt, w ciągu 2 minut mamy wszystkie odpowiednie szablony skopiowane w folderze na Dysku Google.
Na Dysku Google mamy miliardy plików, z których korzysta 100 tys. użytkowników. Bez klasyfikacji AI nie bylibyśmy w stanie oznaczać plików etykietami na dużą skalę. Już samo jej włączenie zapewnia dodatkową wartość.
Na Dysku gromadzimy rozwiązania ze wszystkich poprzednich projektów, dzięki czemu nasze zespoły nie muszą wymyślać koła na nowo, gdy rozpoczynają nowy projekt.
Przeczytaj odpowiedzi na najczęstsze pytania.
Tak, możesz przenieść ważne dane Twojej organizacji z obecnie używanych rozwiązań do przechowywania danych do Google Workspace przy użyciu naszych narzędzi i usług do migracji.
Wersje Business i Enterprise Google Workspace zapewniają klientom elastyczne opcje pozwalające uzyskać potrzebne miejsce na dane. Aby zobaczyć, który abonament sprawdzi się najlepiej w Twojej firmie, zajrzyj na stronę z informacjami o abonamentach i cenach.
W biznesowej wersji Dysku masz więcej miejsca na dane, bardziej rozbudowaną pomoc i dyski współdzielone dla zespołu. Aby dowiedzieć się więcej o różnych dostępnych opcjach, odwiedź stronę z informacjami o abonamentach i cenach.

title: Google Drive: compartilhe arquivos on-line com armazenamento em nuvem seguro | Google Workspace
description: Conheça a plataforma de compartilhamento de arquivos do Google Drive, que oferece uma opção de armazenamento na nuvem seguro e pessoal para compartilhar conteúdo com outros usuários.
text:
Tenha acesso a um armazenamento em nuvem com tecnologia de IA que facilita o compartilhamento de arquivos e aprimora a colaboração.
Faça o resumo de documentos longos, sintetize informações e extraia dados sobre seu conteúdo sem ter que pesquisar em vários arquivos. Descubra o que mais a IA pode ajudar você a fazer e experimente o Google Workspace com o Gemini.
Tenha um armazenamento em nuvem fácil de usar e escalonável para negócios e equipes de todos os tamanhos. Faça upload, abra, edite e compartilhe arquivos usando qualquer dispositivo.
Aumente seu armazenamento de 15 GB para 5 TB por usuário ou peça ainda mais espaço.
Salve e organize anexos do Gmail diretamente no Drive sem sair da caixa de entrada.
Digitalize e armazene comprovantes, extratos e muito mais como PDFs pesquisáveis no app Drive para Android ou iOS.
Gerencie, acesse, edite e organize seus arquivos em uma única plataforma para simplificar seu fluxo de trabalho.
Edite e organize PDFs e arquivos dos apps Documentos, Planilhas, Apresentações ou do Microsoft Office em tempo real. Além disso, tenha acesso a mais de 100 tipos de arquivos diferentes!
Destaque textos e adicione ou edite comentários diretamente em PDFs.
A pesquisa do Drive com tecnologia de IA oferece resultados rápidos, confiáveis e relevantes com base na sua atividade.
Este recurso está disponível em alguns planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Em um só lugar, você tem um panorama rápido das atividades nos seus arquivos no Workspace, ganhando mais eficiência.
Libere todo o potencial dos seus funcionários facilitando a colaboração e o trabalho em equipe.
Compartilhe arquivos facilmente com permissões que podem ser personalizadas, seja para editar, comentar ou visualizar. Controle ainda mais o acesso, evitando ações indesejadas e definindo datas de validade.
Este recurso está disponível em alguns planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Com eles, as equipes têm um local para armazenar, acessar e gerenciar arquivos em conjunto.
Este recurso está disponível em alguns planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Solicite assinaturas eletrônicas e gerencie facilmente seus contratos com fornecedores, clientes, colaboradores e muito mais.
Este recurso está disponível em alguns planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Importe e crie arquivos do Google Drive em apps de terceiros, como Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP e muitos outros, e turbine seu trabalho.
Mantenha seus dados na infraestrutura confiável do Google Cloud, que tem integração total com os apps do Workspace.
Uma abordagem baseada no navegador e com priorização da nuvem sempre atualizada sem instalar nada.
Este recurso está disponível em alguns planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Recursos de segurança robusta, como a criptografia do lado do cliente e o Vault com abordagem de confiança zero, protegem seus dados mais importantes.
Este recurso está disponível em alguns planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
A classificação por IA aprende a marcar automaticamente o conteúdo que você considera sensível no Google Drive.
Uma abordagem baseada no navegador e com priorização da nuvem sempre atualizada sem instalar nada.
Este recurso está disponível em alguns planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Recursos de segurança robusta, como a criptografia do lado do cliente e o Vault com abordagem de confiança zero, protegem seus dados mais importantes.
Este recurso está disponível em alguns planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
A classificação por IA aprende a marcar automaticamente o conteúdo que você considera sensível no Google Drive.
Aproveite ao máximo o Drive no seu computador e atualize automaticamente todos os arquivos armazenados. Disponível para Windows e MacOS.
Automatizamos nosso processo de início. Quando recebemos um novo projeto, em dois minutos, todos os modelos relevantes são duplicados em uma pasta do Google Drive.
Temos 100 mil usuários e bilhões de arquivos no Google Drive. Não seria possível conduzir o processo de rotulagem em grande escala sem a classificação por IA. Ela agrega valor imediatamente, desde a ativação.
O Drive serve como ponto de referência para soluções de todos os nossos projetos anteriores, para que nossas equipes não sintam que precisam reinventar a roda ao iniciar um novo projeto.
Confira a seção de perguntas frequentes.
Sim, você pode mover os dados corporativos importantes das suas soluções atuais de armazenamento para o Google Workspace usando nossos serviços e ferramentas de migração.
As edições Business e Enterprise do Google Workspace oferecem opções flexíveis de armazenamento que atendem às demandas dos clientes. Encontre a assinatura ideal para sua empresa na nossa página de planos e preços.
Na versão do Drive para empresas, você tem mais armazenamento, um suporte mais abrangente e drives compartilhados para sua equipe. Saiba mais sobre as várias opções disponíveis na página de planos e preços.

title: Google Drive: partilhe ficheiros online com armazenamento na nuvem seguro | Google Workspace
description: Saiba mais sobre a plataforma de partilha de ficheiros do Google Drive, que oferece uma opção de armazenamento na nuvem pessoal e segura para partilhar conteúdo com outros utilizadores.
text:
Armazenamento na nuvem com tecnologia de IA para a partilha de ficheiros simplificada e uma colaboração melhorada.
Veja informações importantes resumindo documentos longos, sintetizando informação e acedendo a factos rápidos sobre o seu conteúdo sem ter de pesquisar em diversos ficheiros. Saiba que mais o Gemini pode ajudar a fazer e experimente o Google Workspace com o Gemini.
Armazenamento na nuvem simples e escalável para pessoas e equipas de todos os tamanhos. Atualize, abra, partilhe e edite ficheiros em qualquer dispositivo.
Aumente facilmente o armazenamento de 15 GB a 5 TB por utilizador, com a possibilidade de pedir mais armazenamento.
Guarde e organize os anexos do Gmail diretamente no Drive sem sair da caixa de entrada.
Digitalize e armazene rapidamente recibos, extratos de faturação e muito mais, como PDFs pesquisáveis, diretamente a partir da app do Drive para Android ou iOS.
Um único local para gerir, aceder, editar e organizar os seus ficheiros sem esforço para um fluxo de trabalho simplificado.
Edite e organize PDFs e ficheiros do Google Docs, Sheets, Slides e Microsoft Office em tempo real. Aceda ainda a 100 outros tipos de ficheiros!
Adicione e edite comentários diretamente nos PDFs realçando o texto.
A pesquisa no Drive com tecnologia de IA oferece velocidade e fiabilidade, e apresenta rapidamente resultados relevantes com base nas suas atividades.
Esta funcionalidade está disponível em determinados planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Aceda rapidamente a uma vista geral da sua atividade de ficheiros no Workspace num único local, permitindo-lhe agir de forma eficiente.
Liberte o pleno potencial da sua equipa com colaboração otimizada e trabalho em equipa simplificado.
Partilhe facilmente ficheiros com autorizações personalizáveis (editar, comentar, ver). Controle mais o acesso impedindo ações indesejadas e definindo datas de validade.
Esta funcionalidade está disponível em determinados planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Os discos partilhados oferecem às equipas um local para armazenar, aceder e gerir ficheiros em conjunto.
Esta funcionalidade está disponível em determinados planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Peça assinaturas eletrónicas e faça facilmente a gestão de contratos de fornecedores, contratos de clientes, aprovação de intervenientes e muito mais.
Esta funcionalidade está disponível em determinados planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
Importe e crie ficheiros do Google Drive com apps de terceiros, como o Slack, o Zoom, o Salesforce, o Atlassian, o SAP e muitos mais, para simplificar o seu trabalho.
Guarde os seus dados na infraestrutura de confiança do Google Cloud que se integra perfeitamente com as suas apps do Workspace.
Uma abordagem baseada na nuvem e no navegador que é atualizada constantemente sem ter de instalar programas.
Esta funcionalidade está disponível em determinados planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
As capacidades de segurança robustas, como a encriptação por parte do cliente e o Vault com abordagem de confiança zero, salvaguardam os dados importantes.
Esta funcionalidade está disponível em determinados planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
A classificação de IA aprende de forma inteligente o que o utilizador considera conteúdo confidencial e faz a respetiva etiquetagem automática no Google Drive.
Uma abordagem baseada na nuvem e no navegador que é atualizada constantemente sem ter de instalar programas.
Esta funcionalidade está disponível em determinados planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
As capacidades de segurança robustas, como a encriptação por parte do cliente e o Vault com abordagem de confiança zero, salvaguardam os dados importantes.
Esta funcionalidade está disponível em determinados planos do Google Workspace Business e Enterprise.
A classificação de IA aprende de forma inteligente o que o utilizador considera conteúdo confidencial e faz a respetiva etiquetagem automática no Google Drive.
Tire o máximo partido do Drive diretamente no seu computador. Mantenha todos os seus ficheiros do Drive atualizados automaticamente. Disponível para Windows e MacOS.
Automatizámos o nosso processo de início. Quando recebemos um novo projeto, em dois minutos, temos todos os modelos relevantes duplicados numa pasta do Google Drive.
Temos 100 000 utilizadores e milhares de milhões de ficheiros no Google Drive. Não conseguiríamos lidar com o processo de etiquetagem em escala sem a classificação de IA. Aumenta o valor imediatamente, a partir do momento em que é ativada.
O Drive serve como ponto de referência para soluções de todos os nossos projetos anteriores, para que as nossas equipas não sintam que precisam de reinventar a roda quando começam um novo projeto.
Consulte as nossas Perguntas frequentes para saber mais.
Sim, pode usar os nossos serviços e ferramentas de migração para mover dados importantes da organização para o Google Workspace a partir das suas soluções de armazenamento atuais.
As edições Business e Enterprise do Google Workspace oferecem aos clientes opções flexíveis para dar resposta às suas necessidades de armazenamento. Para determinar o plano mais adequado para a sua empresa, visite a nossa página de planos e preços.
A versão para empresas do Drive oferece mais armazenamento, apoio técnico melhorado e discos partilhados para a sua equipa. Saiba mais sobre as várias opções disponíveis na página de planos e preços.

title: Google Drive: Share Files Online with Secure Cloud Storage | Google Workspace
description: Learn about Google Drive’s file sharing platform that provides a personal, secure cloud storage option to share content with other users.
text:
AI-powered cloud storage for seamless file sharing and enhanced collaboration.
Gain valuable insights by summarizing long documents, synthesizing information, and retrieving quick facts about your content without having to search through multiple files. See what else Gemini can help you do and try Google Workspace with Gemini.
Simple and scalable cloud storage for people and teams of all sizes. Upload, open, share and edit files from any device.
Scale your storage effortlessly from 15GB to 5TB per user, plus the ability to request additional storage. Storage costs vary.
Save and organize Gmail attachments directly to Drive without leaving your inbox.
Quickly scan and store receipts, billing statements and more as searchable PDFs, directly from the Drive app for Android or iOS.
One place to manage, access, edit, and organize your files effortlessly for a streamlined workflow.
Edit and organize Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, Microsoft Office files, and PDFs in real-time. Plus, access over 100 other file types!
Add and edit comments directly in the PDFs by highlighting text.
Drive's search, powered by AI, offers speed, and reliability by quickly surfacing relevant results based on your activities.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Get a quick overview of your file activity across Workspace in one place, empowering you to act efficiently.
Unleash your team's full potential with seamless collaboration and effortless teamwork.
Easily share files with customizable permissions (edit, comment, view). Control access further by preventing unwanted actions and setting expiration dates.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Shared drives give teams a place to store, access, and manage files together.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Request electronic signatures and easily manage vendor agreements, customer contracts, stakeholder sign-off, and more.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Import and create Google Drive files within third party apps like Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP and many more to streamline your work.
Keep your data in the trusted Google Cloud infrastructure that seamlessly integrates with your Workspace apps.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
Get the most out of Drive right from your computer. Automatically keep all your Drive files up to date. Available for Windows and MacOS.
We’ve automated our kick-off process. When we have a new project come in, within two minutes, we have all of the relevant templates duplicated in a Google Drive folder.
We have 100,000 users and billions of files in Google Drive. We couldn’t handle the labeling process at scale without AI classification. It provides value immediately, from the moment you turn it on.
Drive serves as a reference point for solutions from all our past projects so that our teams won’t feel like they need to reinvent the wheel when they start a new project.
Take a look at our FAQs to learn more.
Yes, you can use our migration tools and services to move your organization’s important data to Google Workspace from your current storage solutions.
Google Workspace’s Business and Enterprise editions provide customers with flexible options to meet their storage needs. To see which plan works best for your business, please visit our plans and pricing page.
The business version of Drive gives you more storage, stronger support, and shared drives for your team. Learn more about the various options available on the plans and pricing page.

title: Google Drive: Share Files Online with Secure Cloud Storage | Google Workspace
description: Learn about Google Drive’s file sharing platform that provides a personal, secure cloud storage option to share content with other users.
text:
AI-powered cloud storage for seamless file sharing and enhanced collaboration.
Gain valuable insights by summarizing long documents, synthesizing information, and retrieving quick facts about your content without having to search through multiple files. See what else Gemini can help you do and try Google Workspace with Gemini.
Simple and scalable cloud storage for people and teams of all sizes. Upload, open, share and edit files from any device.
Scale your storage effortlessly from 15GB to 5TB per user, plus the ability to request additional storage. Storage costs vary.
Save and organize Gmail attachments directly to Drive without leaving your inbox.
Quickly scan and store receipts, billing statements and more as searchable PDFs, directly from the Drive app for Android or iOS.
One place to manage, access, edit, and organize your files effortlessly for a streamlined workflow.
Edit and organize Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, Microsoft Office files, and PDFs in real-time. Plus, access over 100 other file types!
Add and edit comments directly in the PDFs by highlighting text.
Drive's search, powered by AI, offers speed, and reliability by quickly surfacing relevant results based on your activities.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Get a quick overview of your file activity across Workspace in one place, empowering you to act efficiently.
Unleash your team's full potential with seamless collaboration and effortless teamwork.
Easily share files with customizable permissions (edit, comment, view). Control access further by preventing unwanted actions and setting expiration dates.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Shared drives give teams a place to store, access, and manage files together.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Request electronic signatures and easily manage vendor agreements, customer contracts, stakeholder sign-off, and more.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Import and create Google Drive files within third party apps like Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP and many more to streamline your work.
Keep your data in the trusted Google Cloud infrastructure that seamlessly integrates with your Workspace apps.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
A cloud-first, browser-based approach that is constantly updated without the need to install anything.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
Robust security capabilities like Client-side encryption, Vault with Zero Trust approach safeguards your valuable data.
This feature is available on some Google Workspace Business and Enterprise plans.
AI classification intelligently learns what you consider as sensitive content and automatically labels it in Google Drive.
Get the most out of Drive right from your computer. Automatically keep all your Drive files up to date. Available for Windows and MacOS.
We’ve automated our kick-off process. When we have a new project come in, within two minutes, we have all of the relevant templates duplicated in a Google Drive folder.
We have 100,000 users and billions of files in Google Drive. We couldn’t handle the labeling process at scale without AI classification. It provides value immediately, from the moment you turn it on.
Drive serves as a reference point for solutions from all our past projects so that our teams won’t feel like they need to reinvent the wheel when they start a new project.
Take a look at our FAQs to learn more.
Yes, you can use our migration tools and services to move your organization’s important data to Google Workspace from your current storage solutions.
Google Workspace’s Business and Enterprise editions provide customers with flexible options to meet their storage needs. To see which plan works best for your business, please visit our plans and pricing page.
The business version of Drive gives you more storage, stronger support, and shared drives for your team. Learn more about the various options available on the plans and pricing page.

title: Google Диск: предоставляйте доступ к файлам онлайн с помощью безопасного облачного хранилища | Google Workspace
description: Google Диск – облачная платформа для хранения файлов и безопасного предоставления доступа к ним.
text:
Облачное хранилище на базе искусственного интеллекта поможет без труда предоставлять доступ к файлам и более эффективно работать совместно.
Делайте сводки длинных документов, создавайте контент и систематизируйте факты, не тратя время на поиск по нескольким файлам. Узнайте, что ещё может Gemini, и попробуйте Google Workspace с Gemini.
Облачное хранилище с масштабируемой инфраструктурой подойдет командам любого размера. Загружайте файлы в хранилище, открывайте и редактируйте их, а также настраивайте доступ к ним с любого устройства.
Вы можете увеличить хранилище с 15 ГБ до 5 ТБ на пользователя, а также запросить дополнительное пространство.
Сохраняйте и систематизируйте прикрепленные файлы из Gmail на Диске, не покидая папки "Входящие".
Сканируйте и сохраняйте квитанции, выписки по счетам и другие документы в виде PDF-файлов с возможностью поиска напрямую из приложения "Google Диск" для Android и iOS.
Оптимизируйте рабочие процессы: систематизируйте и редактируйте файлы, управляйте ими и предоставляйте к ним доступ в одном сервисе.
Редактируйте и систематизируйте в режиме реального времени файлы Microsoft Office и PDF, а также файлы документы, таблицы и презентации Google. Кроме того, на Диске можно хранить файлы более 100 типов.
Добавляйте и редактируйте комментарии в PDF-файлах с помощью выделения текста.
Быстро находите на Диске то, что вам нужно, благодаря поиску на основе искусственного интеллекта, который учитывает ваши действия с файлами.
Эта функция доступна только в Google Workspace Business и Enterprise.
Получайте краткий обзор всех действий с файлами в Workspace, чтобы сделать работу ещё эффективнее.
Раскройте потенциал своей команды благодаря бесперебойной совместной работе и слаженному взаимодействию коллег.
Предоставляйте доступ к файлам с помощью настраиваемых разрешений на просмотр, редактирование и комментирование. Вы также можете задать срок действия разрешений и указать действия, которые запрещены.
Эта функция доступна только в Google Workspace Business и Enterprise.
Расширьте возможности команд за счет общих дисков, которые позволяют хранить файлы и настраивать доступ к ним.
Эта функция доступна только в Google Workspace Business и Enterprise.
Запрашивайте электронные подписи и легко управляйте договорами с поставщиками, клиентами и партнерами.
Эта функция доступна только в Google Workspace Business и Enterprise.
Импортируйте и создавайте файлы Google Диска в сторонних приложениях, таких как Slack, Zoom, Salesforce, Atlassian, SAP и многих других, чтобы оптимизировать свою работу.
Храните данные в надежной облачной инфраструктуре Google Cloud, которая легко интегрируется с вашими приложениями Workspace.
Сервисы с облачной инфраструктурой, которые не требуют установки приложений, доступны в браузере и постоянно обновляются.
Эта функция доступна только в Google Workspace Business и Enterprise.
Надежные средства безопасности, такие как шифрование на стороне клиента и Сейф с моделью нулевого доверия, защищают ваши ценные данные.
Эта функция доступна только в Google Workspace Business и Enterprise.
Классификация с помощью ИИ изучает, какой контент вы считаете конфиденциальным, и автоматически помечает его на Google Диске.
Сервисы с облачной инфраструктурой, которые не требуют установки приложений, доступны в браузере и постоянно обновляются.
Эта функция доступна только в Google Workspace Business и Enterprise.
Надежные средства безопасности, такие как шифрование на стороне клиента и Сейф с моделью нулевого доверия, защищают ваши ценные данные.
Эта функция доступна только в Google Workspace Business и Enterprise.
Классификация с помощью ИИ изучает, какой контент вы считаете конфиденциальным, и автоматически помечает его на Google Диске.
Используйте все возможности Диска на компьютере. Актуальность версий файлов на Диске поддерживается автоматически. Доступно для Windows и MacOS.
Мы автоматизировали процесс запуска. Когда мы получаем новый проект, то уже через две минуты у нас есть все необходимые шаблоны из папки на Google Диске.
У нас 100 000 пользователей и миллиарды файлов на Google Диске. Без ИИ-классификации защищать данные в таких масштабах было бы невозможно. Польза становится очевидной сразу после включения этой функции.
На Диске мы храним все решения, которые были найдены в ходе предыдущих проектов. Это позволяет нашим командам не изобретать велосипед, когда они начинают новый проект.
Ознакомьтесь с ответами на часто задаваемые вопросы.
Да. Вы можете использовать наши инструменты и сервисы переноса, чтобы перенести важные данные организации в Google Workspace из ваших текущих решений для хранения данных.
Версии Google Workspace Business и Enterprise предлагают клиентам разные варианты объема хранилища. Чтобы выбрать оптимальный план для вашей организации, изучите информацию на странице планов и цен.
В версии для бизнеса объем хранилища больше, предоставляются дополнительная поддержка и общие диски для команд. Чтобы узнать больше обо всех преимуществах, ознакомьтесь с информацией настранице планов и цен.
